forum.description: got a new feature idea for anyland, or anything that could be improved?
forum.latestCommentText: i wonder if the game can actually handle that many script lines.

thread.title: picture taking

comments.text: if you can phillip, it would be nice to have a sort of picture taking command or setting to where you could have it display what it last saw
